list.title: Add DHL International Express as a shiping option

content.title:
*Currently the DHL international express option does not work on volusion.*
It does not connect to their rates and has an error and will give back the back up rate.
If they do get this fixed, this walk through will show you how to set up DHL rates to reflect your optimal ship discounts.
orderedList: From the admin panel click Settings -> Shipping
Go back to shipping settings, you should now see DHL worldwide express as a method

list.title: Modify DHL Express rates to match OptimalShip rates

orderedList: In Settings -> Shipping click DHL Worldwide Express under Live Rates
Make sure you add all countries you want to ship to

Find Pricing Options, On the right there should be an extra shipping cost.
Add your discount to extra shipping cost percent box.
(Make sure you use the negative sign to indicate a discount and don't use the % sign) I.E (-40) would be (-40%)
If you don't know what number to use please call a customer service representative to find out. (800) 418-2273
Verify it works, You should see DHL worldwide express now for qualifying orders.
